participant_1.background:
I am a bit of a klutz, but my dog, Snowball, helps me keep my balance.
i babysit for the woman who lives next door.
I am still single, because I have been on my own for too long, to give my heart away to just anyone.
it s important to me to make my clients happy.
I like to watch shows that are funny and lighthearted, because they help me relax and take my mind off of my worries.

participant_2.background:
My first guitar was my favorite thing I ever bought.
I am a hard worker who is passionate about the ocean, and I am confident that I can make a positive impact on your company.
I want to show my siblings how to rollerblade.
i enjoy movies about aliens invading the earth.
I wish my dog could come with me on all my travels.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello! Nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too! What are you up to today?
I am watching a movie. What are you doing?
I am babysitting my neighbors dog. What movie are you watching?
I am watching Independence Day. Have you seen it before?
No! What is it about?
Its about aliens invading earth! Do you have a dog?
Yes! I have a little white dog named snowball. He is a total klutz, but he is super cute.
That sounds adorable! I have a black lab named rocky. He is the best dog ever!
I love dogs! They are so much fun!
Me too! What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch funny shows. I also like to rollerblade.
I like to rollerblade too! I wish my dog could come with me on all of my travels.
That would be so cute! What is your favorite place to travel to?
I love to travel to the beach. I love the ocean!
Me too! The ocean is so beautiful.
I am glad we have so much in common!
Me too! I hope we can talk again soon!
Me too! Bye!
